document.full_text: two iraqi men were arrested and charged in kentucky with trying to help al qaeda militants in their home country and one of the suspects was also charged for attacks on u.s. troops there, the justice department said on tuesday.
document.title: iraqis charged in u.s. with trying to help al qaeda
lines_and_colors: two iraqi men were arrested and charged in kentucky with trying to help al qaeda militants in their home country and one of the suspects was also charged for attacks on u.s. troops there, the justice department said on tuesday.
